basics.name: Anas Akhomach
basics.label: data Scientist
basics.summary: A Moroccan-born data Anaylist / Engineer / Scientist, widely ranked among the greatest and most influential scientists of all time

work.name: STE SMART-SEND
work.summary: Improved ROI of customer acquisition campaigns by 10% through segmented data analysis (SQL, Python) and optimized targeting. Developed 2 Power BI dashboards for real-time KPI tracking, reducing team decision-making.
highlights: Improved ROI of customer acquisition campaigns by 10% through segmented data analysis (SQL, Python) and optimized targeting.
Developed 2 Power BI dashboards for real-time KPI tracking, reducing team decision-making.

work.name: Supply Chain Management Center
work.summary: Delivered ERP system training and optimized reporting processes through technical training sessions and process automation initiatives.
highlights: Focused on automated reporting to reduce manual data entry.

work.name: Martile Secondary School
work.summary: Enhanced student performance through tailored teaching methods and multilingual support, while mentoring students to achieve national competition success.
highlights: Improved class average from 3.7 to 3.3 using personalized learning plans and GeoGebra tools.

work.name: Independent Studio
work.summary: Full-cycle mobile game production using Unity, managing end-to-end development from concept design to store publication and analytics monitoring across 10+ published titles.
highlights: Published 10+ mobile games on Google Play Store with 1,000+ cumulative downloads.
Managed complete technical stack including C# scripting, UI/UX design, and store listing optimization.

volunteer.name: Community Mountain Guides Network
volunteer.summary: Designed and executed 50+ community-led hiking experiences in Northern Morocco's Rif Mountains, coordinating all logistical elements from risk assessment to cultural education.
highlights: Created 15+ adaptive trail plans balancing weather patterns (using Windy.com forecasts), group fitness levels, and daylight hours.

courses: Recognized as equivalent to a German Bachelor's degree (Statement of Comparability by the ZAB).

certificates.name: Anaconda Python for Data Science Professional Certificate
OpenEDG Python Institute: Programming with Python Professional Certificate

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
